title: 48.892 CLERICAL SERVICES OFFICES.
text: A bank may perform clerical services, as defined in section 48.89, subdivision 1, for itself at an off-premises data processing and storage center located within the state if the bank furnishes assurances satisfactory to the commissioner that the performances of those services will be subject to regulation and examination by the commissioner to the same extent as if the services were being performed at the bank's main office or detached facility. A data processing and storage center is not considered a branch or detached facility, as defined in section 47.51. The establishment of a data processing and storage center may include acquiring real and personal property, which shall be subject to section 47.10.
